step1Desc: Select your birds and quantity on our website. It is very fast.
step2Desc: Pay a small fee to secure your slot in the queue.
step3Desc: We confirm your payment within a few minutes.
step4Desc: Our manager will call you within 5 minutes to discuss pick-up.
step5Desc: Your chicks are allocated to the nearest agent close to you. Pick up and start rearing!
heroTitle: Buy Chicks. Rear Them. Sell Back. Make Profit.
heroSubtitle: Start small. Grow fast. We sell healthy day-old chicks. You rear them. We buy them back at a good price. No stress. No market struggle.
problemTitle: Many people rear chicken very well...
problemDesc: They buy feed, treat sickness, and take care day and night. But when birds mature, they don't know where to sell fast. Buyers delay, prices are low, and the market is stressful. That is the problem we solve.
solutionDesc: We sell strong healthy chicks, good feed, and quality tools. We guide you every step and buy back your mature birds for hotels and restaurants. We understand this business because we are inside it.
challengesSubtitle: And our easy solutions for you.
solFeed: We guide you on proper feeding systems to reduce waste.
solSickness: We advise on basic medication and hygiene to keep them healthy.
solMarket: We buy back your birds at a very fair price.
solTools: We sell high-quality feeders and drinkers (tools).
solCare: We guide you step-by-step. You are not alone in this.
agentDesc: Anyone can register. Earn ₦50 – ₦100 per chick you sell. No farm or capital needed. Just connect buyers and earn easy money.
trustDesc: Booking fee secures your slot. Allocation is fast. Nearest agent is provided. Clear communication. Real poultry business. No hidden stories.
footerSlogan: Simple poultry business. Real profit opportunity.
sellToUsDesc: Have mature birds ready? No buyer? Need fast cash? We buy at a good price. Contact us directly. Fast response. No long story.
searchPlaceholder: Search by phone, name, or booking ID...
accessDeniedAdmin: You do not have permission to access the admin dashboard.
accessDeniedCEO: Only CEO accounts can manage system-wide users.
accessDeniedAgent: You must be a registered agent to access this portal.
errorFetchingBookings: There was a problem loading the bookings list.
manageProductsDesc: Update your catalog of birds and fees.
productCatalogSubtitle: Manage your available birds and booking fees.
noProductsFoundDesc: Start by adding your first poultry product.
seedingProductsDesc: Demo products are being added to your catalog.
seedingFailedDesc: Could not add demo products. Check console.
editProductDesc: Update the details for this poultry item.
addProductDesc: Fill in the details for the new product.
inactiveProductsDesc: Inactive products will not be visible to customers.
noOtherUsersFoundDesc: Other registered users will appear here.
userStatusUpdated: The user's account status has been updated.
referralLinkDesc: Share this link with customers. When they book, you earn commission.
errorLoadingAgentData: We couldn't load your agent profile.
confirmationSubtitle: Your booking is confirmed. We will call you within 5 minutes.
confirmationDesc: A confirmation has been sent to your phone: {phone}.
bookingStep1Subtitle: Select the type of chicken you want to rear.
noProductsForBookingDesc: Check back later or contact us directly.
bookingStep2Subtitle: Select the quantity you want to book.
bookingStep3Subtitle: Tell us who you are so we can call you.
phoneNumberDesc: We will call this number within 5 minutes of booking.
bookingStep4Subtitle: Check your details before paying the booking fee.
importantHowItWorksDesc: After you pay the booking fee, our manager will call {phone} immediately to provide the nearest pick-up point.
loginSubtitle: Log in to manage your bookings or your agent portal.
loginForTestingDesc: If you don't have an account, please Sign Up first.
signupSubtitle: Join AFDEC and start your poultry business.
creatingDemoAccountsDesc: Use these emails to test different roles:
statusUpdatedAndCommissionDesc: Booking completed. {amount} added to agent balance.
